sentences.sContent: The formal education sector comprises primary and secondary school institutions.
sentences.sContent_eng: The formal education sector comprises primary and secondary school institutions.
sentences.sCn: 正式教育机构包括初级和中等教育机构。

sentences.sContent: He is trying to set up a new secondary school in Acton because he is not satisfied with the choice facing his four children under six.
sentences.sContent_eng: He is trying to set up a new secondary school in Acton because he is not satisfied with the choice facing his four children under six.
sentences.sCn: 他也正努力在阿克顿建立一所新的中等学校。 他对他那四个不到六岁的孩子将要面临的选择而不满。

sentences.sContent: The government provides free education at both primary and secondary school levels and provides some financial assistance for private schools.
sentences.sContent_eng: The government provides free education at both primary and secondary school levels and provides some financial assistance for private schools.
sentences.sCn: 政府对初级和中级学校都提供免费教育，并对私立学校给予一定的经济支持。

trans.tranOther: a school for children between the ages of 11 and 16 or
